directions: Heat the sesame oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.  Cook the garlic and ginger until fragrant and light brown, about 1 to 2 minutes.  Add the mango and cook for another minute to soften slightly.  Stir in the curry powder and cilantro; cook for another minute to release the flavor of the curry.
Pour in the coconut milk and bring to a simmer.  Stir in the tofu and season to taste with salt and pepper.  Simmer until the liquid is reduced by half, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package extra firm tofu, cubed
1/4 teaspoon salt and pepper to taste
title: Indian Hot Curried Mangos with Tofu
